amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that state and local laws regarding hunting, fishing, trapping and netting shall be the exclusive laws regarding these activities on the trail.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-519 to state that state and local laws regarding hunting, fishing, trapping and netting shall be the exclusive laws regarding these activities on the trail.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
